title: cy Before you start
paragraph1: cy We're building a new service. Different designs are being tested and changed based on feedback from users.
paragraph2: cy You'll be asked some questions to check you're eligible to use this service.
paragraph3: cy To make your claim, you'll need the following information to hand:
list1: cy Information about the type of notice you've given and when it was given (if applicable)
list2: cy Details about the property you'd like to claim possession of
list4: cy Your grounds for posession and details about your reasons for making a possession claim
